item.description: Maria Vasilevsky, co-founder of style consulting agency Stilista (www.stilistaboston.com), will give you the basics for looking hip and feeling great in your clothes! Whether you work, stay at home with the kids, or a little of both, Stilista's tips fit any lifestyle, age,and budget. Fashion and style need not be intimidating, so be prepared for a fun-filled evening.Expect real, usable shopping tips, Stilista's picks for great stores and deals and how to take your look to the next level with accessories. Bring your style questions, as there will be a question and answer period.
item.name: The Well Dressed Mom
